title: Textile, 18th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Light rose moiré taffeta ground with floral serpentines partly brocaded in colored silks and partly created by floats of the alternate pink and white primary wefts. Taffeta ground interrupted by stripes of satin weave with superimposed blossoms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Silk.  Fancy cloth, brocaded.
Technique:. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-10.
